basic.floral_language:
Philodendron'con-go'
Floriography: blessed, vigorous, tenacious
Philodendron'con-go' is an evergreen foliage plant that can absorb toxic gases to clean the air. It has green and shiny leaves, thick and long oval shape. Usually put in the study, living room, bedroom, adding greenness.
Philodendron'con-go' likes half shaded environments, place under scattered light. Has spathe type flowers.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, spathe flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade environments, avoid strong light, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, rub leaves with water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
